text: 1.44: Wkp 14.1-32; Mk 3.12; 7.36; Ru 5.14“Ndu khueŋ kaŋgiri, ndu kha bigeŋ bun harigi guma the suaŋ thari. Ndu ŋgɨv wo fhavar mba Fhe Bakɨme rotu gari guma khɨvav, mba Moses fhum suaŋgi tɨv, ndu mba tɨva zɨn ŋgɨv, wo rɨmrɨm vhɨzgi ne suaŋv Fhe Bakɨme suaŋv shaman muuŋgiri. Mbe maaŋ muuŋgip gangip kaŋgirga, ndu rɨmrɨm vhɨzgi.”
